# maximumCount

**Type Property**

The maximum number of heartbeats you can add to the sample.

## Declaration

```swift
class var maximumCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

After reaching the maximum count, any attempt to call the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartbeatSeriesBuilder/addHeartbeatWithTimeInterval(sinceSeriesStartDate:precededByGap:completion:)] method fails.

## Creating a Heartbeat Series Builder

- **init(healthStore:device:start:)**: Creates a new heartbeat series builder.
